sentence.Network_en: Many parents are worried about drug addiction among the schoolchild.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多家长因在孩子中存在的毒品成瘾问题而担忧.

sentence.Network_en: A schoolchild in Cambodia can have a Gmail account.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个柬埔寨的小学生也可以申请Gmail帐号.

sentence.Network_en: It is now known to every schoolchild that the earth is round.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在每个小学生都知道地球是圆的.

entry.def: Schoolchildren are children who go to school.

example.ex: Last year I had an audience of schoolchildren and they laughed at everything.
example.tran: 去年我对一群学童讲话，他们听到什么都笑。

means.word_mean: 1. a young person attending school (up through senior high school)

auth_sentence.content: Picture a schoolchild with fingers in his ears, humming.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Picture a schoolchild with fingers in his ears, humming.

Sentence.sentence: For more than two decades, starting in the 1960s, the poet Ted Hughes sat on the judging panel of an annual poetry competition for British schoolchildren.

sentences.en: We just sat there giggling like naughty schoolchildren.
sentences.cn: 我们只是坐在那儿像调皮的小学生一样的咯咯地傻笑。
